divs: sighting detailsmy brother snapped what he thought was a shot of the mountans and later saw a disc in the background. my brother and his family pulled off the road off of rt 12 heading east towards trinidad, co - exact location on rt 12 unknown. he saw a nice view of the mountains and decided to take a picture. he snapped 3 pictures one after the other at high speed (3 picture in approx 3-4 seconds) and the disc only appeared in one. he did not notice the disc in the background for quite some time (month or two) and then one day happened to notice it while admiring the view in the picture. he noticed the object by accident. it was small in the frame so it was not clear as to what it was until he blew it up and noticed it was unusual. object appears to be a disc with a small dome on top angled at a 45 degree attitude, silver or gray in color. no lights or anything like that. no shine from the sun bouncing off of it. he thinks it must have gone down behind the mountains at a high rate of speed or it would have appeared in the other pictures as they were taken so quickly one after the other. no feelings at the time the picture was taken - did not know it was even in the picture for a month or two as stated. lost ability to capture more photos because it is suspected to have dropped behind the mountains. now see attached photos - i will include one original size and then a blown up and a false color image showing it is solid - please let me know if anyone can identify this object or authenticate it as i'm not a true believer of ufo's until one lands in my back yard and i see it up close for myself. i have other blowups\darkened views, etc., if anyone would like them as i tried different modifications to get a better view\image. thanks!
trends: There has been one other sighting in Trinidad
There were no other sightings in Trinidad on or around May 1st 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Brother snapped what he thought was a shot of the mountans and later saw a disc in background
